subject: Order #10245 arrived damaged
body: Hello team, my espresso machine (Order 10245) arrived with a cracked water reservoir and leaks badly. I need a replacement before my holiday guests arrive next weekend.

subject: Tracking update requested
body: Can you confirm when my standing desk (Order #88431) will ship? I placed the order 6 days ago for my home office setup and haven't seen a tracking number yet.

subject: Subscription renewal question
body: Hi, I'm evaluating whether to renew our team analytics subscription. Could you send the new pricing tiers and clarify if the Pro plan still includes unlimited dashboards?
